## ğŸ“± Installation

### iOS (TestFlight)

1. Check your email for TestFlight invitation
2. Install TestFlight app from App Store
3. Tap invitation link
4. Install F0 Mobile

### Android (Play Internal Testing)

2. Download from Play Store
3. Opt-in to alpha channel

## ğŸ Reporting Issues

**Found a bug?**
1. Screenshot the issue
2. Note steps to reproduce
3. Send to: alpha-feedback@f0.ai
4. Or file GitHub issue with `alpha` label
